comments: R.I.P Ms. Thomas u will always and forever be missed we love u !
I am very sad. I heard that she was a great teacher and was going to take her next semester, but she passed away. RIP.
she\'s a good teacher, however shes a little grumpy and sometimes rude especaially when you need to ask a question at the end of class

Professor Thomas is GREAT! I am still in the class but it is almost finished. as long as you do the reading you will pass she is one of the few teachers that actualy care. She is a wonderful "Lamplighter" Thank you so much.

Ms. Thomas is a GREAT teacher & person. I took MGMT1 & BUS1 (ONLINE) Got a A in both. She really cares about your education & when you display that you\'re not willing to do your part it saddens her. She stresses "LEARNING IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY" & she is right! If you do what she ask & more you will find that her teaching is very useful & helpful.

Ms. Thomas is a AWESOME instructor. She expects you to learn & is very knowledgeable at what she does. She makes you think about REAL LIFE & how this course ties into your everyday choices in life... Wish there were more instructors like her, she really cares. She is the best instructor I\'ve had. Thanks Ms. Thomas you are appreciated!!

Mrs. Thmoas is the best teacher in all of California. She is beautiful inside and out and anyone who takes her class is lucky to have her. I still remember things she taught me, and she makes learning a wonderful experience.

The greatest failure in life is not to try is what she says. The class was incredible. I never thought it would actually be fun, but it is. The feedback she gives throughout each chapter encouraged me to move forward. Thank you Mrs. Thomas for all that you do and the time you spend in helping us succeed.

I\'ve taken two online classes with her. She prepares you for the real world, no excuses, no extentions. Once you get that, you will do just fine. Mid term and final are on campus. Optional extra credit assignment if you need the credit. Very nice professor once you get that she is no nonsense. I would definately recommend her online class.

I was very impressed with her approach to business. Her lectures were insightful and inspiring. She is a no nonsense kind of instructor, and I respect that. I have become more driven since completing her course. I have gained knowledge that is invaluable to my chosen profession and current field of study. I would highly recommend her to others.
Great teacher she is fun, it was an online class with my midterm and final in person. Assignments don\'t take long to complete and you learn alot. She\'s firm but very nice and cool.

All of the information I learned in the class is helping me with my new job for a legal company. All of the material covered in this course is in my training material for my job. I am grateful I took this class and I know it will help me to excel at my job. Thank you Mrs. Thomas!

Business Bootcamp 101 "Exceed my expecatations" is her mantra. However, her focus is on quantity, not quality of work. Will not acknowledge being less than clear or mistaken (egad, say it isn\'t so). I am flummoxed regarding why previous students rated her so highly.
very clear, easy to follow, fair in testing, no surprises. extra credit assignments are very helpful. A real pleasure to be in her class.
Prof. has an ability to prepare her students to the reality of business world. She\'s one of the most respected professors of WLAC.

Very nice caring person. She cares very much about her students. You pay her a dollar every time your cell phone rings. I\'ll let you find out what she does with the money she collects on the day of your final exam. Do all your homework, and you will be fine. You will learn a lot in her class. Professor Thosmas is an inspirational person.

Her motto is "the greats failure in life is not to try". You pay her a $1 each time your cell phone goes on in class (even if its on vibration) she even dances. She is a very nice person, cares about her babies. Babies = students in class. Don\'t waste her time, she is not their to be a babysitter. She really cares what your future plans are and lik

She is an easy "A", she gives extra credit, follow her syllubus, have your homework done, and you shall be fine. She may run behind in the syllubus but as long as you follow it you will do great because she does not cover it all in class and you need to study some on your own!

Very nice person but very hard teacher. Unfair method of grading, its too hard to get an A in her class. Explains the chapters only when in good mood but if in bad mood you will be doomed. I would not recommend if you are looking for good grades and to learn something.
She is a nice teacher.
